xs.description: Extra small button height. Use for inline actions, compact toolbars.

sm.description: Small button height. Use for secondary actions, compact layouts.

md.description: Medium button height. DEFAULT for most buttons.

lg.description: Large button height. Use for prominent CTAs.

xl.description: Extra large button height. Use for marketing CTAs.

xs.description: Extra small horizontal padding (8px). Use for compact icon buttons.

sm.description: Small horizontal padding (12px). Use for secondary action buttons.

md.description: Medium horizontal padding (16px). Use for standard buttons. DEFAULT.

lg.description: Large horizontal padding (24px). Use for prominent CTA buttons.

xl.description: Extra large horizontal padding (32px). Use for marketing buttons.

borderRadius.description: Default button border radius (4px). Use for consistent alignment with inputs.

md.description: Medium button font size. Uses sm for better proportions.

fontWeight.description: Button font weight. Semibold for clear affordance.

duration.description: Button transition duration for hover/active states.
